title: 2012 The Masters Grand Slam of Curling – Men's event
text:
The men's event of the 2012 <a href="The%20Masters%20Grand%20Slam%20of%20Curling">Masters Grand Slam of Curling</a> was held from November 14 to 18 at the <a href="Wayne%20Gretzky%20Sports%20Centre">Wayne Gretzky Sports Centre</a>, the <a href="Brantford%20Golf%20%26amp%3B%20Curling%20Club">Brantford Golf & Curling Club</a> and the <a href="Brant%20Curling%20Club">Brant Curling Club</a> in <a href="Brantford">Brantford</a>, <a href="Ontario">Ontario</a> as part of the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20World%20Curling%20Tour">2012–13 World Curling Tour</a>. Some of the men's Tier I round robin games were held at the Brantford Golf & Curling Club, while the remainder of the Tier I games and the playoffs round games were held at the Wayne Gretzky Sports Centre. The men's Tier II games and playoffs qualifiers were held at the Brant Curling Club. It was held as the first <a href="Grand%20Slam%20of%20Curling">Grand Slam</a> event on the men's tour.
In the final, <a href="Kevin%20Koe">Kevin Koe</a> of Alberta defeated <a href="Jim%20Cotter%20%28curler%29">Jim Cotter</a> of British Columbia with a score of 7–5.
The event is split up into two tiers, with 18 teams in Tier I and 16 teams in Tier II. The Tier I teams were divided into 3 pools of 6 teams which played in a round robin, while the Tier II teams played off in a triple knockout event. 8 Tier II teams qualified for a playoff to determine which two teams would enter the playoffs along with six Tier I teams.
